name: Denpa Shounen-teki Kenshou Seikatsu Soft - Nasubi no Heya [SDC]
description:
Welcome to TADA No HEYA...

TRADITION...

NOTE:  AT PRESENT, THIS IS ONLY A DEMO IF THE PROLOGUE.  THE REST OF THE GAME IS STILL UNDER PRODUCTION AND WILL BE RE-RELEASED IN CHAPTERS, AS THEY ARE FINISHED.

GAME FILE IS .APK AND PLAYS ON ALL ANDROID PHONES.

THE INFORMATION BELOW APPLIES TO THE GAME AS A WHOLE.

GAMEPLAY:

The type of game is called a "visual novel".   As the name suggests, It's a novel with a visual element, and, is heavily reliant upon narrative and choice.  Gameplay is guided via reading  narrative, clicking to procede, as well as pertanent choice making.  The choices You make will HEAVILY effect the  Game's direction, and, Your inevitable success of failure in Said Game.  

Excitingly enough!  This Game Will have MULTIPLE different paths You can take and MULTIPLE different endings.  

STORY:

"TADA No HEYA" revolves around A Man, living a life Gray and Misfortunate life, named "Haku Blackwood".  A downtrodden man in his early thirties, forced to leave home 10 years prior, or be crushed under the reputation and Expectations of His Illustrious Family. 

He now lives on His own, far away from his Family, doing His best to survive.  Nightly, He is haunted by nightmares and grief over the little Sister He left behind.

It was a normal day, which starting off like every other, that sadly, would begin to spell the end of His life...

While at His remedial, soul-crushing job, He receives a call from His Father's assistant. The Assistant wished "Haku" to travel back to His home-town and check on his Sister. who had been acting strange, and stopped answering any attempts to get ahold of her.  

After much consideration, he sucks up any fears or reservations, prepares, and sets off on His way to His Sister's home to check on Her.

When He arrives He discovers a scene and events that will throw into question everything he knew about his family, his sister and the nature of life and death.

This game is a horror-mystery.
